name: Street Sharks: The Game!
description:
They FIGHT! They BITE! They stand for everything RIGHT!

Tear up the streets and beat those SEEVIATES a lesson about who runs the roads! Finally, the official game adaptation of the hit cartoon "Street Sharks!" is available to play today!

     Play as RIPSTER, STREEX, JAB or SLAMU in this pulse pounding, monster battling adventure of a lifetime:

- 4 selectable characters
- Based on the hit tv show!
- Fight through the city streets, down by the fishing wharf and deep under the sea in a genetic slamming secret lab!
- Take to the streets - or dive UNDER THEM using your STREET SHARK ABILITIES
Available in WINDOWED or FULLSCREEN modes for WINDOWS!
- Keyboard AND Gamepad compatible!
